game.name: Tokyo Xtreme Racer
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, HDR 사용 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Tokyo Xtreme Racer" is a racing game set in a blocked-off future Tokyo, where players aim to be the fastest by driving their best cars on the highways that weave through the city.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Tokyo Xtreme Racer" is a racing game set in a blocked-off future Tokyo, where players aim to be the fastest by driving their best cars on the highways that weave through the city.

reviewHighlights.text: 나쁘지는 않은데 포인트 모으기가 너무 빡세요
